section.div: Mise à jour V.8.5 du Globe dans le formulaire de contact améliorations liés au ralentissement du globe Changes to be committed: modified: app/components/globe/globe.jsx modified: app/components/globe/main.jsx modified: app/components/globe/marker.jsx new file: app/components/globe/textures/earth_atmos.jpg new file: app/components/globe/textures/earth_bump_roughness_clouds.jpg new file: app/components/globe/textures/earth_clouds.png new file: app/components/globe/textures/earth_day_2.jpg new file: app/components/globe/textures/earth_lights.png new file: app/components/globe/textures/earth_night_2.jpg new file: app/components/globe/textures/earth_normal.jpg new file: app/components/globe/textures/earth_specular.jpg modified: app/components/globe/utils/config.js modified: app/components/globe/utils/shaders.js
